strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_BLASTKNUCKLES_DESC: As Loader, kill a teleporter boss in a single punch.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_BLOODTESTER_DESC: Heal for 5,000 health in a single run.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_COFFEEBAG_DESC: Reach +150% move speed and attack speed.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CRYPTICSOURCE_DESC: As Mercenary, complete 3 Ethereal teleporters in one run.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_HOTTESTSAUCE_DESC: Carry a Kjaro's Band, Gasoline, and Will-o'-the-wisp all at once.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_HUNTERSSIGIL_DESC: Deal 1,000 damage or more with a single critical strike.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_MALICE_DESC: Complete the Stage 3 Teleporter Event on Typhoon difficulty.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NKOTASHERITAGE_DESC: Carry 25 unique items in a single run.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_STICKYOVERLOADER_DESC: As MUL-T, collect 20 green items in a single run.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_STRANGECAN_DESC: Inflict 6 debuffs at once to a single enemy.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_UNIVERSALCHARGER_DESC: As Engineer, kill 400 enemies with your turrets.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_URANIUMHORSESHOE_DESC: As Bandit, complete stage 3 in less than 15 minutes on Typhoon difficulty.
